author: lsankar
content: There’s room for more if this is something you’re thinking abt building

author: raulj
content: There's the prysm web ui https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/web-interface which is open source here https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm-web-ui. We are working on a v1 release which will have parity with the CLI as a way of managing your validator

author: raulj
content: We believe web applications are likely a better choice for this, as you have no need to worry about cross-platform compatibility, it is easy, and doesnt rely on tools such as electron compared to making a desktop app
